18#include "tools.h"
19
20static int _lvdisplay_single(struct cmd_context *cmd, struct logical_volume *lv,
21 void *handle)
22{
23 if (!arg_count(cmd, all_ARG) && !lv_is_visible(lv))
24 return ECMD_PROCESSED;
25
26 if (arg_count(cmd, colon_ARG))
27 lvdisplay_colons(lv);
28 else {
29 lvdisplay_full(cmd, lv, handle);
30 if (arg_count(cmd, maps_ARG))
31 lvdisplay_segments(lv);
32 }
33
34 return ECMD_PROCESSED;
35}
36
37int lvdisplay(struct cmd_context *cmd, int argc, char **argv)
38{
39 if (arg_count(cmd, columns_ARG)) {
40 if (arg_count(cmd, colon_ARG) || arg_count(cmd, maps_ARG)) {
41 log_error("Incompatible options selected");
42 return EINVALID_CMD_LINE;
43 }
44 return lvs(cmd, argc, argv);
45 } else if (arg_count(cmd, aligned_ARG) ||
46 arg_count(cmd, noheadings_ARG) ||
47 arg_count(cmd, options_ARG) ||
48 arg_count(cmd, separator_ARG) ||
49 arg_count(cmd, sort_ARG) || arg_count(cmd, unbuffered_ARG)) {
50 log_error("Incompatible options selected");
51 return EINVALID_CMD_LINE;
52 }
53
54 if (arg_count(cmd, colon_ARG) && arg_count(cmd, verbose_ARG)) {
55 log_error("Options -v and -c are incompatible");
56 return EINVALID_CMD_LINE;
57 }
58
59 return process_each_lv(cmd, argc, argv, 0, NULL,
60 &_lvdisplay_single);
61}
